criteria: Ability to identify healthy food and beverage options.
Ability to make healthy selections in different settings.
Understanding of nutritional information and its impact on health.
descriptions: Student cannot identify any healthy food or beverage options.
Student can identify 1-2 healthy food or beverage options with prompting.
Student can identify a few healthy food and beverage options with some prompting.
Student can identify several healthy food and beverage options with minimal prompting.
Student can independently identify many healthy food and beverage options.
Student can comprehensively and independently identify a wide range of healthy food and beverage options and explain why they are healthy.
Student does not make healthy selections in any setting and consistently chooses unhealthy options.
Student makes healthy selections in one setting with significant guidance.
Student makes healthy selections in a couple of settings with some guidance.
Student makes mostly healthy selections in a variety of settings with minimal guidance.
Student independently and consistently makes healthy selections in a variety of settings.
Student expertly and consistently makes healthy selections in various complex scenarios, demonstrating a thorough understanding of nutritional needs and situational factors.
Student demonstrates no understanding of nutritional information or its impact on health.
Student demonstrates a very basic understanding of nutritional information (e.g., calories) but does not connect it to health.
Student demonstrates a basic understanding of some nutritional information and makes a limited connection to health.
Student demonstrates a good understanding of nutritional information and its connection to health with some prompting.
Student demonstrates a strong and independent understanding of nutritional information and its impact on health.
Student demonstrates a comprehensive and nuanced understanding of nutritional information, its impact on health, and can apply this knowledge in complex and varied situations.
